messages.title: Support for the armed forces and their families
messages.content: Pledging to 'do his bit' for the British armed forces, Graham Brady says: 'This is a time when we are asking so much of our brave service men and women and the loved ones they leave behind; politicians and government must do everything we can to give them the support, resources and equipment they need'

messages.title: Keeping your taxes down
messages.content: As a key member of the cross-party campaign to stop the Congestion Charge being imposed on Greater Manchester, Graham says: 'The congestion charge would have been a massive new tax on my constituents, by hitting commuters, the poorest hardest, it could have saddled Manchester with an extra tax burden that nobody could afford, just as we entered a severe recession. I am glad that I was able to help protect local people and local jobs from this ill-conceived proposal'

messages.title: Fighting for our excellent grammar and high schools
messages.content: Here in Trafford we have the best state schools in the country. I have taken every opportunity to tell people how good they are and to press the authorities to allow them to grow. I will continue to campaign on behalf of our top class grammar and high schools.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support for the armed forces and their families
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to providing support, resources, and equipment for the British armed forces and their families.
Opposition to the imposition of a congestion charge and a commitment to keeping taxes low for constituents.
Advocacy for quality education by supporting the growth and preservation of top class grammar and high schools in Trafford.

issues.education: Advocacy for quality education by supporting the growth and preservation of top class grammar and high schools in Trafford.

endorsements.endorser: Michael Thompson, Headteacher, St Ambrose College
endorsements.endorsement: Throughout Graham's career we have seen that his principles and integrity come far ahead of his own interests.

quotes.text: Throughout Graham's career we have seen that his principles and integrity come far ahead of his own interests.
quotes.source: Michael Thompson, Headteacher, St Ambrose College

images.caption: Graham Brady campaigning with key messages focusing on support for the armed forces, keeping taxes down, and fighting for excellent grammar and high schools.
